title: Once upon a mouse and other mousetime stories
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animation (Cinematography)
abstract: The Flying mouse (1934, 9 mins)--Three blind mouseketeers (1936, 9 mins)--Brave little tailor (1938, 9 mins)--Ben and me (1953, 20 mins)
description: This video has put together a compilation of magical Disney animated cartoons in tribute to everyone's favourite mouse, Mickey Mouse, along with other mouse stories, including Amos the church mouse in "Ben and me". Mickey features in the Oscar nominated "Brave little tailor". Also includes a bonus feature on the legacy of Walt Disney and the history of Walt Disney Productions using archival footage, excerpts from many of the Disney productions such as "Snow White and the seven dwarfs", "Pinocchio", "Lady and the Tramp", "Peter Pan" and a brief glimpse into the beginnings of Mickey Mouse as a cartoon character.
